## Background color

```{r}
span(
  .style %>%
    padding(4) %>%
    background("teal")  # <-
)
```

### Possible colors

```{r color, echo=FALSE}
div(
  .style %>%
    display("flex") %>%
    flex(justify = "between", wrap = TRUE),
  lapply(names(background_color_), function(color) {
    div(
      .style %>% margin(2),
      div(color) %>% text(align = "center"),
      div(
        .style %>%
          padding(3) %>%
          background(color)
      )
    )
  })
)
```
